results.name: Triangle read by rows, A007318 * (A007476 * 0 ^(n-k))
formula: Triangle read by rows A007318 * (A007476 * 0^(n-k)) = binomial transform of an infinite lower triangular matrix with A007476 as the main diagonal: (1, 1, 1, 2, 4, 9, 23, 65, 199,...) and the rest zeros.
